info.brief_description: Stella from HIMYM takes her daughter on a vacation, but soon someone will be in diapers
info.description:
Choose what happens next, make it as detail as possible please, like two paragraphs max

Make Stella go back in diapers, or Lucy go back into diapers or both

Other characters are included, including Robin and Lily, or other shows can join in like Clarie and Haley and Alex from Modern Family, or some girls from Big Bang Theory or many more, as long as Stella and Lucy are the main characters

Its a crossover diaper fic lol!

So have fun!
